channel.title: A few questions. [317] [DELTA]
channel.description:
Question #1: How do I make a command that will take players with rights 2 and up to an admin zone?
Question #2: How do I change home?
Question #3: (I remembered) My server has working Box Sets, and I wanted to know how to mak it os when I seperate them different things come out.
Question #4: How do I make it so you can only teleport if you have a certain level? For example I want a teleport that takes you to a Room of high leveled monsters that drop rares and godswords frequently. How can I make it so you can only use that command once the person has achieved all 99 combat stats?

item.title: A few questions. [317] [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

sk1llmunky:

to change respawn area make a new account (wat i do) and do ::mypos. this will tell you your position, and then you search it in either the player.java or playerhandler.java i dont remember exactly

Thanks but I need to know who to change box sets now. =)

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions. [317] [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @sk1llmunky sk1llmunky
item.description:
@sk1llmunky wrote:

to change respawn area make a new account (wat i do) and do ::mypos. this will tell you your position, and then you search it in either the player.java or playerhandler.java i dont remember exactly

item.title: A few questions. [317] [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“x1 att ftw x, post:2, topic:390254”]Lol question 3 is amazing

  1. This is a Command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && playerRights >= 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); toX = 2193; toY = 3254; sM("Welcome To Staff Zone! "); }
The Coords are A good Spot for Staffzone, But if u want to change it then you can
Changing Home is simple Just Go into Client.Java and Search The Coords of Your Previous Home
(Note: To do this Make A new acc And Type In ::mypos[/quote]

Thanks bro. I <3 yuuu.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions. [317] [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

Lol question 3 is amazing

  1. This is a Command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("staffzone") && playerRights >= 2) { String[] args = command.split(" "); toX = 2193; toY = 3254; sM("Welcome To Staff Zone! "); }
The Coords are A good Spot for Staffzone, But if u want to change it then you can
Changing Home is simple Just Go into Client.Java and Search The Coords of Your Previous Home
(Note: To do this Make A new acc And Type In ::mypos

Read full topic
